items.sentence: Tom told me that he was planning to study abroad.
Tom usually wears blue slippers around the house.
Tom was a pretty good singer when he was younger.
Tom was standing in front of the guest room door.
Why can\'t we just tell Tom that we can\'t do it?
A lot has changed around here since you\'ve left.
Tom wanted to know why Mary didn\'t want to come.
No one knows how many people died in that battle.
No one seems to have the guts to do that anymore.
Nobody can stop us from doing what we want to do.
